tasks.label: mimic: debug server
tasks.command: docker exec -it mimic-server python -m debugpy --wait-for-client --listen 0.0.0.0:5678 -m uvicorn app.api.server:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 9000

tasks.label: mimic: debug test
tasks.command: docker exec -it mimic-server python -m debugpy --wait-for-client --listen 0.0.0.0:5678 -m pytest ${relativeFile}

tasks.label: xbird: runserver
tasks.command: docker exec -it django python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000

tasks.label: xbird: manage.py
tasks.command: docker exec -it django python manage.py ${input:manage.py command}

tasks.label: xbird: debug analyzer
tasks.command: docker exec -it analyzer python -m debugpy --wait-for-client --listen 0.0.0.0:5678 analyzer.py
